content:
[Update: I don't know whether I'll go over for the welcome drinks 5pm+ or not until the speaker dinner 6:30-ish... possibly the later]

It's about 45 minutes by metro from the Corendon (station henk sneevlietweg) to our welcome drinks. And cheap - only EU3.20! (The 45 minutes includes walking from Centraal Station to the ferry, and the ferry ride.)

I'd be happy to travel along with anyone who's going. My timing is completely flexible. Message me here or +1-603-459-5119.
I was thinking of driving there. I expect to arrive at Corendon in about 3 hours (have to stop for chocolate), so if I am there on time I'm glad to give a ride to anyone
Update: at check-in I met up with our Friday keynoters Kristina and Kate Sheridan. We're meeting at reception NO LATER THAN 5:30 to walk to the nearby metro.
:-) How big a van do you have - 12 person? :-)
I will meet at the dinner. Had some delay in Rotterdam
A bit late to the party, did the group leave already?
